As a member of @SASCDems & as Ranking Member of @HSGAC, I am keenly aware that a strong manufacturing industry is key to our national defense.
 
I proposed a new plan to boost American manufacturing.  https://www.peters.senate.gov/newsroom/press-releases/peters-announces-proposal-to-establish-a-national-institute-of-manufacturing-make-manufacturing-policy-a-major-national-focus … pic.twitter.com/93ruQQbixY

Our international competitors know something I have said for years: You can’t be a great country if you don’t manufacture great products to sell worldwide.
 
More from @crainsdetroit on my plan to revitalize American manufacturing ⬇️ https://www.crainsdetroit.com/manufacturing/sen-peters-propose-national-institute-manufacturing-bring-programs-under-one-agency …

We can't let bureaucracy and disjointed federal programs stifle innovation in manufacturing. We need government to be nimble & coordinated. In a rapidly changing future—the key to success will be adaptability. pic.twitter.com/ABxU329nGw

Federal programs that support manufacturing are scattered across different agencies & are siloed from one another.

Let's unite these programs under one umbrella to boost coordination, cut waste & strengthen the our ability to respond to evolving needs. https://www.detroitnews.com/story/news/politics/2019/06/18/peters-proposes-national-manufacturing-institute/1487472001/ …
